description:
In this first-ever free course from bestselling Udemy instructor Jonathan Levi, we explore the role of failure as a methodology for entrepreneurial success.

Recorded during a public lecture given at Google Campus TLV in March of 2016, this course is guaranteed to inspire, inform, and entertain!

Learn to Embrace & Utilize Failure as a Powerful Teaching Tool

Whether or not you have entrepreneurial aspirations, this course will help inspire and motivate you to embrace failure in your own life as a learning opportunity, while properly applying the safety net and mindset to fail both smarter and faster.

Take the Shortcut to the Top - By Learning From Others' Mistakes

A serial entrepreneur since childhood, Jonathan shares some of his most educational failures along the road towards building numerous multi-million dollar businesses, extracting the wisdom and learnings he accumulated along the way.

The end result is a fast-track to success - both entrepreneurial and otherwise.

Skip the Biggest Pitfalls That Hinder Most Entrepreneurs

Throughout the course, Jonathan shares the creme-de-la-creme of entrepreneurial advice and guidance, gleaned from over 25 years of entrepreneurial endeavors. 

You'll learn powerful lessons about:

  • Leadership & Management
  • Product marketing
  • Branding
  • Customer Development
  • "Lean" Startups
  • Lifestyle Design
  • The importance of goals
  • Business Management
  • ...and much, much more!

The course is comprised of video lectures, with an optional slide deck available for download.
title: How to Reach Entrepreneurial Success: Fail Smarter & Faster
